page.title: 02TACOLNESTON
page.content:
{Tacolneston pronounced Tackelston}is a village of approx 700 population some 11 miles south of Norwich & is strung out for over a mile along the B1113. With its mixture of new developments & its older cottages & houses some of which are listed buildings,it has a thriving population.A conservation area exists at the north end of the village & includes the church, Old Hall,Tacolneston Hall,& the Manor.
{There are no shops}except one selling fish and chips but General Stores & PO are within walking distance at Forncett End. A number of tradesmen call regularly as does the Mobile Library.The First School,Village Hall, recreation ground & The Pelican pub are the main centres in the village. Villagers use the Health Centres at either Long Stratton or Wymondham.
